benchmark_details.name: SocialMaze
benchmark_details.overview: SocialMaze systematically incorporates three core challenges: deep reasoning, dynamic interaction, and information uncertainty. It provides six diverse tasks across three key settingsâ€”social reasoning games, daily-life interactions, and digital community platforms, designed to evaluate social reasoning in LLMs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To rigorously evaluate the social reasoning capabilities of large language models.

data.source: Diverse tasks designed to evaluate social reasoning capabilities.
data.annotation: Automatically generated based on defined rules and patterns, with human validation.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on task completion rates and model performance over defined benchmarks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates improved social reasoning capabilities in LLMs, especially in complex, dynamic scenarios.
methodology.validation: Validation procedures were implemented through automated and human evaluation methods to ensure data quality.
